Title: Goldbergs Never Say Die!
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Adam F. Goldberg (creator), Kristopher Valentine (staff writer)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Barry and Erica join Adam and his friends on a Goonies-inspired treasure hunt for some family jewels misplaced by Pops.
